title: Best-ever Slow Cooker, One-pot and Casserole Cookbook
description: "Tasty and tender meals with all the nutrients locked in - over 400 easy to prepare step-by-step recipes shown in 1700 superb photographs. Includes wide-ranging recipe ideas for hearty soups and chowders, tasty terrines, melt-in-your-mouth braises, succulent roasts, comforting hot-pots, flavorsome pasta and rice dishes, divinely creamy custards, light-as-air steamed desserts and even hot punches and drinks. Each recipe is presented step-by-step with clearly written text and color photos for all stages of preparation and every finished dish. A complete nutritional analysis of the fat, carbohydrate, salt and calorie count for each recipe is included to help you plan your meals successfully."
author: Catherine Atkinson
